## EntityModelAnimation.setClampWhenFinished() method

Sets whether the animation should clamp when finished, holding the last frame.

**Signature:**

```typescript
setClampWhenFinished(clampWhenFinished: boolean): void;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

clampWhenFinished


</td><td>

boolean


</td><td>

Whether to clamp when finished.

\*\*Side effects:\*\* Emits `EntityModelAnimationEvent.SET_CLAMP_WHEN_FINISHED` when spawned.

\*\*Category:\*\* Entities


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

void
